Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You got it!<sp:5:0:0> Forget your troubles, and have
a nice, peaceful sleep.
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Oh, that's shame.<sp:5:0:0> Well, I hope to see
you soon!
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh dear. You don't have enough rupees...<sp:5:0:0>
But do come stay with us soon.
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Sir, you haven't got enough rock salt...<sp:5:0:0>
Come again when you have some.
Talk_0012: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Did you sleep well?<sp:5:0:0> Come again anytime!
Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh, it's you, the traveler! Good to see
you again!<sp:0:4:0>...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_00>It's...<sp:5:0:0> It's me, remember? We met at
<clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>Hmph. You're a horrible voe if you can
forget a fabulous woman like me.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>But your saving grace is that you've done
so much good around here.<sp:0:4:0>You beat those awful pirates, and you
rebuilt my inn, without which I'd have no
way to make a living.
<snd:LaughS_00>And indeed, the whole village benefits
from the customers I draw here.

Sarqso, from the bottom of my heart!


Now then, my special <clr:0000>salt spa<clr:ffff> will soothe
your body and soul.
Talk_0014: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Now relax,<sp:5:0:0> and leave the rest to me!
Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>You've got some knots back here...<sp:5:0:0> Soon,
you'll feel fresh as a coastal breeze!
Talk_0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I ask my customers to bring their own
rock salt for the spa.

I'll need <clr:0000>five pieces <clr:ffff>of <clr:0000>rock salt<clr:ffff>. Is that
all right?
Talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>When I see the sunset leaving its
colors on the water, I think of my
hometown, <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>...
Talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Welcome, sir!<sp:0:4:0>I have to thank you for what you did.
Without my inn, I'd have no way to
make a living.
And indeed, the whole village benefits
from the customers I draw here.<sp:0:4:0>Sarqso, from the bottom of my heart!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry...<sp:5:1:0> I spent some time as a refugee in
the Gerudo region, so I picked up some of
the local language. 
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Sarqso! Thank you for coming!<sp:0:4:0>Now then, my special <clr:0000>salt spa<clr:ffff> will soothe
your body and soul.
Talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Sav'aaq!


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>...Oh, there I go again. I can't seem to
shake off the Gerudo language.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>I meant to say, "Rise and shine!"<sp:5:1:0>
No matter what time it is, that's the best
thing to hear when you wake up.
Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>You're a traveler, right? Do you happen
to know anything about <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>?
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>If you haven't even heard of it, I can't
expect you to know its fate.

Lurelin Village is on Hyrule's southeastern
coast. It's a small fishing town.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I used to run an inn there, until a gang of
<clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff> descended upon us.

I fled all this way with nothing but the
clothes on my back.
Talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Fair enough. I can't expect you to know
anything about my little fishing town on
the southeastern coast.
*sigh* While I'm glad I found refuge in
the desert, away from those pirates, I do
miss the ocean...
Talk_0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>It's a small fishing town on the
southeastern coast of Hyrule.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I used to run an inn there, until a gang of
pirates descended upon us.

I had to flee with nothing but the clothes
on my back.
Talk_0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>This place is safe enough. The sand
shroud has settled down, and the
soldiers can chase off the monsters...
But who's going to chase away the
<clr:0000>pirates <clr:ffff>that attacked my village?
Talk_0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>And what do I find out here? A terrible
<clr:0000>sand shroud <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>mysterious monsters<clr:ffff>
lurking about.
I don't know what to do with myself now.
Talk_0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Rise and shine! This is the time we
agreed on. Come again!
Talk_0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Rise and sav'aaq!


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>...Did I just mix Hylian and Gerudo?
Sorry. Seems I truly can't shake off the
Gerudo language.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>But maybe that's not a bad thing!
Talk_0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh! I was about to go rouse you, but...<sp:5:0:0>
you woke up right on schedule!

Do come again!
Talk_0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Rise and shine!


I meant to rouse you, but...<sp:5:0:0>you woke up
right on schedule!

That's a good signâ€”<sp:5:0:0>it means your body
got all the rest it needed. Come back to
the salt spa soon!
Talk_0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>It feels safe here, at least, with all the
soldiers around to protect us.

I just can't help but wish my village had
been so well defended.

Then maybe the monsters wouldn't have
taken it over...
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>A bed at the inn will cost <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>.
But for a weary traveler like you, I suggest
our salt spa! It uses soothing <clr:0000>rock salt<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Fair enough. It's a small village, and it's a
long ways southeast of here.

I can't expect you to know about such a
remote place.
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You can use a bed here for free.<sp:5:0:0> Or would
you like to experience our calming salt
spa, which uses <clr:0000>rock salt<clr:ffff>?
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>You don't know what a salt spa is?
You're missing out!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>In short, I give you a massage using rock
salt mixed with Lurelin seawater. It'll relax
you like nothing else!
I ask you to bring your own <clr:0000>rock salt<clr:ffff>,
but it's worth it. You'll be amazed how
soft it makes your skin feel!
